AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO. 03 / 2010 
 
 
 
Subject :   Access of Vehicle up to the aircraft to His Holiness   
                             Jagadguru Sri Balagangadharanatha Mahaswamji and   
                             using of VIP lounge on medical grounds at airports in the   
                             country.  
 
 
 
       Please refer to this Bureau Circular No.16/2008 dated 
16/12/2008 on the subject cited above.  
 
       His Holiness Jagadguru Sri Balagangadharanatha Mahaswamji  
is permited to avail the access of his vehicle up to the tarmac, on medical 
grounds during his departure / arrival by air at all airports in the country for 
a period of one year. 
 
                 This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA). 
 
 
 
 
 
 ( M. Malaviya, IPS )  
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
